en-GB.name: Prizes
en-GB.desc: Welcome to the prizes section. Here you may find teams who have won prizes in tournaments for being 1st, 2nd and 3rd place and for being most lethal or fair.
en-GB.title: Short introduction to the prize or the winning team.
en-GB.about: Details about the prize. Did the winning team/coach get something in real life?

fr-FR.name: Récompenses
fr-FR.desc: Bienvenue dans la section des récompenses. Vous pourrez trouver ici les prix reçu lors des tournois.
fr-FR.title: Courte introduction à la récompense ou à l'équipe gagnante.
